content.text: Hi, my name is [name redacted].  What's yours?
I am passionate about my family, and I love to eat ice cream.
Ice cream is delicious!  I have three sisters who are the most important people in my life.
I grew up in Nevada.  Where are you from?
My mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.  I live in New Mexico.
I have a crush on a girl from my class, but I'm too afraid to tell her.
I've been rejected several times, and I thought about giving up on dating.
I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance.
I sometimes forget to walk my dogs, which I know is not good for them.
I think it's important to take care of your pets.
I agree.  I need to do a better job of taking care of them.
I'm sure they would appreciate it.
Thanks for chatting with me.  It was nice to meet you.
You're welcome.  It was nice to meet you too.
